messages.subject: Limits...again
messages.msgSnippet: You all aren t giving her want she wants and she isn t giving you all what you want, and nobody s going to admit to being overly-critical or overly-sensitive
messages.messageBody:
You all aren't giving her want she wants and she isn't giving you all
what you want, and nobody's going to admit to being overly-critical or
overly-sensitive so can we get on with another topic. Such as:

did you know MIT offers OpenCourseWare (free classes) over the internet
for anyone? You can't get credit for the classes, but when my 11yo
daughter asked this week if she could take some college classes online
(she's been watching a show with college kids on it), I said, "Sure"
and we went to the website, she picked something she like (Playwriting)
and has gotten busy.

Just thought you'd like to know about that option in case any of you
have kids who are so inclined!

Kelly Lee
